WorkItem.ClosedComment: Issues does not lie with the Item, it's with the Warlock model not handling Special Effects yet.
WorkItem.Description:
in rawr 2.3.8 and below the Spyglass is listed as a very low trinket.  even worst then the titan-forged rune of audacity.  (111 sp) however the spyglass is 131 crit and 180 sp.   if you look at the proc  "Item - Icecrown 10 Normal Caster Trinket 
Each time you deal spell damage to an opponent, you gain 18 spell power for the next 10 sec, stacking up to 10 times."   There is no ICD on this trinket.  everytime damage is done it refreshes.  does not matter for dot or direct damage.  Most fights I have 99.9%+ uptime on this proc.  Which would make it much higher on the dps factor.  
 
 
Thanks

Comments.Message:
Please read and follow the Posting Guidelines:
* Did not state model affected
* Did not provide an example char file where issue can be seen

The proc is being parsed from the sources and is giving value in the Mage model. Without the above required information we cannot move forward on this issue.
afflic warlock   will upload example fire soon
the new warlock module has yet to implement the proc system hence the reason for the low rating.
